div.p: Splunk Impact Cloud (SIC) is the production environment for Splunk for Good (SFG), Splunk's corporate social responsibility program.

ul.li: Take the SIC skillset survey if you wish to contribute to SFG SIC-related projects.
Latest news and information at our Pwny Portal page.
A list of SFG projects is located in Confluence.
Join our Slack room, #splunkforgood, to get involved with SFG projects!

div.p: Please contact Satoshi Kawasaki (s@splunk.com) for questions, comments, and issues regarding SIC and its apps.
